newsitem.title: USA: Excel to close plant, takes Q1 reserve.
newsitem.headline: Excel to close plant, takes Q1 reserve.

text.p: Excel Industries Inc said Thursday it plans to close a plant in Battle Creek, Mich., on or before December 15.
The company said it will record an $8.7-million pretax restructuring reserve in the first quarter to cover the cost of closing the Michigan plant and another plant in Rockford, Ill.
Excel previously annnounced the Rockford plant would shut down by July 31.
Closing the Michigan auto parts facility, which Excel received when it acquired Anderson Industries in April 1996, will affect about 170 employees, the company said.
Excel is a vehicle parts manufacturer.
